name: Footprint Technologies
tag_list: frank-triantos, engineering-services, information-systems, technology, systems-engineering, web-development
overview:
Footprint Technologies is an engineering and information services provider headquartered in Chevy Chase, Maryland, with offices in Downtown Washington DC just steps from the Capital.

The company has fielded, enhances and maintains several Information Systems while engineering the processes that control their use. The FAAâ€™s Life Cycle Asset Tracking System (LCATS) is composed of hand-held linear and 2D barcode scanners that port maintenance and inventory data seamlessly into a national database modeling Facilities in the National Airspace System (NAS). LCATS collects data that paves the way for Reliability Centered (RCM) or Conditions Based Maintenance (CBM). The Air to Ground Communications Site Survey Database (SSDB) captures general and technical information about FAA facilities from field engineers across the NAS that can then be used for Engineering Analysis. Footprint Technologies is providing Program Management Support, Engineering Services, Database Management Support, Acquisition and Business Support, Presentations and Instructional System Design Support. Footprint Engineers have supported NEXCOM Segment 1a and 2, Airport Cable Loop, RCE, ASDE-X, Safe Flight 21, ASR9/Mode S Service Life Extension Program and other FAA programs.
